name: reware
description: Reware is a web-based platform that enables users to exchange unused clothing through direct swaps or a point-based redemption system. The goal is to promote sustainable fashion and reduce textile waste by encouraging users to reuse wearable garments instead of discarding them.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server-reware && npm install && cd ../client-reware && npm install

author: ReWear Team
